name: The Juicing Game
description:
by Caleb Noller

The juiciest game around?!! What could be juicier than a game about juicing juice!

 

Orders are streaming in, and it is your job to run a world-class juice bar. Juice oranges, limes and lemons, then mix (and dilute) them to your picky customers' delight.

 

Unique juicing controls: grab the mouse, press one finger on the left button and another with the right, then shake it left and right as fast you can!!!

 

Instructions

  • Left click a fruit basket to pick up a fruit (lime, lemon or orange)
  • Hover mouse over the juicer, click both left and right mouse buttons, then shake the juice out of that fruit!
  • Discard the remains of the fruit by hovering over the bin and left clicking
  • Grab a glass, and fill it with the ratios matching the customer's order: click on the glass, then hover underneath the juicer or jug of water and hold left click to fill it. (If you make a mistake, you can pour the contents of the glass in the bin too.)
  • Take a glass and left click on a customer's order to give it to them. You will then get a score of how well you do!

 

Good luck, and sublime juicing my friend.
